subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Gary Sheffield hit one of Detroit’s three home runs against Daisuke Matsuzaka yesterday, and the Tigers beat the Boston Red Sox, 6-5, to complete a three-game sweep at home.
snippet: Gary Sheffield hit one of Detroit’s three home runs against Daisuke Matsuzaka yesterday, and the Tigers beat the Boston Red Sox, 6-5, to complete a three-game sweep at home.
